hero.title: Your AI Agents,
hero.subtitle: Run multiple Claude Code instances on the same project with shared context, file locking, and real-time control — from any device.
hero.micro_copy: No credit card. Self-hosted. MIT License.
hero.social_proof: Trusted by developers building with Claude Code worldwide

conflict.title: Three agents, one codebase, zero coordination
conflict.description: You launch multiple Claude instances on the same project. They edit the same files. Merge conflicts everywhere. Hours of AI work, lost.

vanishing.title: Context that vanishes between sessions
vanishing.description: Every new Claude session starts from scratch. You paste the same instructions again and again. Your agents forget everything.

blindfold.title: Flying blind with multiple agents
blindfold.description: Which agent is doing what? Who changed that file? Is that task already done? You have no idea until something breaks.

solution.title: Your agents deserve a home.
solution.subtitle: ClaudeNest gives your Claude Code instances shared understanding, conflict prevention, and a unified command center.

pillar_1.title: Shared Intelligence
pillar_1.description: pgvector RAG means your agents build on each other's knowledge — not start from scratch.

pillar_2.title: Conflict Prevention
pillar_2.description: File locking + atomic task claiming = zero merge conflicts, zero duplicated work.

pillar_3.title: Total Visibility
pillar_3.description: See every agent, every task, every keystroke — from your browser or your phone.

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: From a single dashboard to a full multi-agent command center.

remote_access.title: Control from anywhere
remote_access.description: Access your Claude Code instances from any browser, any device. WebSocket relay means every keystroke arrives in real-time, with <50ms latency.

multi_agent.title: Agents that collaborate
multi_agent.description: Run 5+ Claude instances on the same project. Atomic task claiming prevents duplicated work. Each agent knows what the others are doing.

context_rag.title: Shared intelligence
context_rag.description: 384-dimensional vector embeddings via pgvector give your agents semantic understanding of the entire project. They search by meaning, not keywords.

real_time.title: Every keystroke, live
real_time.description: Laravel Reverb WebSocket channels relay terminal output in real-time. Watch your agents work from anywhere — even your phone.

file_locking.title: Zero merge conflicts
file_locking.description: Automatic file locking with expiration, force-release, and bulk operations. Two agents can never edit the same file simultaneously.

mcp_support.title: Infinite extensibility
mcp_support.description: Model Context Protocol support means your agents can use any MCP tool. Discovery is automatic, execution is seamless.

how_it_works.title: Up and running in
how_it_works.subtitle: From installation to full multi-agent orchestration in minutes, not hours.

step_1.title: Install the Agent
step_1.description: One command to connect your machine to the ClaudeNest platform.

step_2.title: Start a Session
step_2.description: Launch Claude Code remotely from any device — web, mobile, or CLI.

step_3.title: Orchestrate
step_3.description: Coordinate multiple agents with shared context, task claiming, and file locks.

comparison.title: See how we
comparison.subtitle: The most complete orchestration platform built specifically for Claude Code.

1.quote: Finally, real orchestration for Claude Code. The file locking and task coordination system means our agents never step on each other. A game-changer for our CI pipeline.

2.quote: The RAG context system with pgvector is a game-changer. Each agent understands the full project context without us manually feeding it information. Self-hosting was trivial.

pricing.title: Free forever.
pricing.subtitle: ClaudeNest is open source and self-hosted. No usage fees, no per-seat pricing, no surprises.
pricing.note: Self-hosted is always free. Managed hosting plans available.

community.name: Community
community.target: For solo developers and small teams

0.question: Is ClaudeNest really free?
0.answer: Yes. ClaudeNest is MIT-licensed and self-hosted. The Community tier is free forever. Pro and Enterprise tiers are for managed hosting and priority support.

1.question: Does it work with any LLM or just Claude?
1.answer: ClaudeNest is purpose-built for Claude Code by Anthropic. This specialization lets us optimize every interaction, from PTY management to context injection. We don't dilute focus by supporting every model.

2.question: How does the RAG context system work?
2.answer: When an agent learns something, we generate a 384-dimensional vector embedding using BGE-small-en and store it in PostgreSQL with pgvector. Other agents search by semantic similarity — meaning, not keywords. The result: agents build on each other's understanding.

3.question: Can multiple agents really work on the same files?
3.answer: Not at the same time — that's the point. Our file locking system prevents two agents from editing the same file simultaneously. Locks have expiration, force-release, and bulk operations. Zero merge conflicts.

4.question: What infrastructure do I need?
4.answer: A Linux server with PHP 8.3+, PostgreSQL 16 (with pgvector), Redis, and Node.js 20. A standard $20/month VPS handles most setups. Docker Compose makes installation one command.

5.question: Is my code sent to your servers?
5.answer: Never. ClaudeNest is self-hosted. Your code, your agents, your infrastructure. We never see your source code or your prompts.

6.question: How does it compare to Claude-Flow?
6.answer: Claude-Flow focuses on swarm intelligence with 60+ agents but has no web dashboard and no mobile app. ClaudeNest provides a complete platform: web dashboard, mobile app, pgvector RAG, and file locking — all purpose-built for Claude Code.

7.question: Can I contribute?
7.answer: Absolutely. ClaudeNest is open source under MIT license. Check our CONTRIBUTING.md for setup instructions, code standards, and our ADR process.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.headline: Built in the open
open_source.description: Inspect every line, contribute features, and self-host on your own infrastructure. No vendor lock-in, ever.

cta.title: Ready to orchestrate your
cta.subtitle: Deploy ClaudeNest in minutes. Control Claude Code from anywhere. Coordinate teams of AI agents on a single project.

footer.description: Remote Claude Code orchestration platform. Open source and self-hosted.
